dc_title_s: Meiji kaisei Tōkyō zenzu Map of Tokyo.
dc_description_s: Copperplate print. In Japanese. North oriented toward upper right. Relief shown by hachures. Includes brief explanatory text, address chart, guide for tourists, time-table and legend in Japanese and English. Includes inset map of Yokohama. Views of tourist attractions in borders. 1 map: col.; 45 x 67 cm., folded in cover 18 x 11 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
